Class GLContext

  • Object
    • GLContext

  • public class GLContext
extends Object
    Author:
    JeT This class manages a GL3/4 context with gl-programs and gl-uniform management, JeT, Bertrand Duménieu

      • setCurrentProgram

        public GLProgram setCurrentProgram(GLProgram program)
                            throws GLException
        set the given program as the current program in use (glUse) If the requested program is already the current one: do nothing
        Parameters:
        program - program instance
        Returns:
        false on error
        Throws:
        GLException
